sentences.en: A selfless man has an indomitable spirit.
Above all Susie is a great survivor, with a bright, indomitable spirit.
sentences.cn: 总之，苏茜不畏艰难，开朗乐观、不屈不挠。

sentences.en: He is endowed with indomitable will.
I only want to play soccer - - this am the indomitable Beckham spirit.
sentences.cn: 我只想踢球 —— 这就是不屈不挠的贝克汉姆精神.

sentences.en: I really admire her indomitable optimism and can - do spirit.
sentences.cn: 我实在佩服她不屈不挠的乐观态度和苦干的精神.

sentences.en: Never does Life yield to diseases an indomitable fight.
sentences.cn: 对抗疾病,生命百般顽强.

sentences.en: No matter what happens, he will an indomitable will without turning back.
sentences.cn: 不管发生什么事, 他都将一无反顾,勇往直前.

sentences.en: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from indomitable will.
sentences.cn: 意志力不是来自于身体, 而是来自不屈不挠的精神.

sentences.en: The style of the Chinese Women's Volleyball Team in a competition is indomitable, bold and vigorous.
sentences.cn: 中国女排比赛时,作风顽强, 大胆泼辣.

sentences.en: The success complete secret only has two speeches: Indomitable, persists!
sentences.cn: 成功的全部秘诀只有两句话: 不屈不挠, 坚持到底!

sentences.en: They loved her that she was indomitable.
sentences.cn: 大家正是因为她犟头倔脑才喜欢她.

sentences.en: They overcame all kinds of difficulties by dint of an indomitable spirit.
sentences.cn: 他们凭仗着顽强不屈的精神克服了重重困难.

sentences.en: This army has an indomitable spirit.
sentences.cn: 这个军队有一往无前的精神.

sentences.en: To make art is an indomitable urge of human beings.
sentences.cn: 艺术创造是人类锲而不舍的追求.

trans.tran_cn: 不屈服的，不气馁的，不可战胜的
